roleset.name: to show clearly
roleset.note: EVINCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'evince' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'show'. (from evince.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Some evinced an optimism that had been rewarded when they didn't flee the market in 1987.
example.arg: an optimism that had been rewarded when they didn't flee the market in 1987
